headline: TKO Declares Quarterly Cash Dividend
summary: NEW YORK, May 30, 2025--TKO Group Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: TKO) ("TKO" or the "Company"), a premium sports and entertainment company, today announced that its board of directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend pursuant to which TKO’s Class A common stockholders will receive their pro rata share of an aggregate distribution of approximately $75 million from TKO Operating Company, LLC to its equityholders. The per share dividend to the holders of TKO’s Class A common stockholders will be $0.38

The per share dividend to the holders of TKO’s Class A common stockholders will be $0.38
